sentences.en: Don't complicate life for me!
sentences.cn: 不要为我把生活搞复杂了!

sentences.en: Frequency shifts due to the presence of the oxygen atom complicate the picture.
sentences.cn: 氧原子导致频率发生位移,增加情况的复杂性.

sentences.en: He did not feel that he was doing anything to complicate his life.
sentences.cn: 他并不认为他现在所做的会给他引起家庭纠葛.

sentences.en: I do not wish to complicate the task more than is necessary.
sentences.cn: 我不想使这项任务不必要地复杂化。

sentences.en: I think that is because we unnecessarily complicate it.
sentences.cn: 我想这是因为我们不必要地将生活复杂化了。

sentences.en: If the answer to all of these questions is no, a framework will only complicate matters.
sentences.cn: 如果所有这些问题的答案都为否，那么使用框架只会把事情变复杂。

sentences.en: Inhalation injury and carbon monoxide poisoning often complicate injury.
sentences.cn: 吸入性损伤和二氧化碳中毒使得热烧伤愈发复杂.

sentences.en: My brother can understand the most complicate circuit diagrams.
sentences.cn: 再复杂的线路图哥哥都能看懂.

sentences.en: Stemming is not advisable because it can sinter and complicate later charging.
sentences.cn: 不宜堵塞炮泥,因为万一炮泥烧结堵死就会使以后的装药工作很麻烦.

sentences.en: That those artifacts needlessly complicate things for users seems a small price to pay.
sentences.cn: 至于那些让界面变得复杂的东西,看起来只是很小的代价.

sentences.en: The bacteria pneumonia may complicate influenza at extremes of age.
sentences.cn: 对于处在年龄两极的人,细菌性肺炎可能使流行性感冒复杂化.

sentences.en: The day's events, he said, would only complicate the task of the peacekeeping forces.
sentences.cn: 他说那天的事件只会使维和部队的任务复杂化。

sentences.en: The enormous numbers of field mice encountered during times of peak populations greatly complicate control.
sentences.cn: 在种群繁殖高峰期间出现的巨量田鼠使防治问题大为复杂.

sentences.en: The involvement of several genes tends to complicate the recovery of high levels of resistance.
sentences.cn: 由于涉及到一些基因,使得高水平抗病性的恢复倾向于复杂化.

sentences.en: The other options simply complicate the situation and could land him with more expense.
sentences.cn: 其他办法只会使情况复杂化，而且可能给他带来更大花销。

sentences.en: The selection service is one of the more difficult services to implement correctly because it has some valuable features that complicate the implementation.
sentences.cn: 选择服务是比较难以正确实现的服务之一，因为它具有一些使实现复杂化的有价值的功能。

sentences.en: The situation is complicated by the fact that I’ve got to work late on Friday.
sentences.cn: 我周五还得加班，这样一来事情更复杂了。

sentences.en: These events will greatly complicate the situation.
sentences.cn: 这些事件将使局势变得极其复杂.

sentences.en: To complicate matters further, everybody's vitamin requirements vary.
sentences.cn: 更麻烦的是，每个人对维生素的需求量是不同的。

sentences.en: To complicate their problems further, the ship and ground anti - aircraft fire had become heavy.
sentences.cn: 难上加难的是舰上和地面上的 高射炮 火比先前更加猛烈了.

sentences.en: Valvular heart disease, usually aortic and mitral insufficiency, can complicate a variety of systemic diseases.
sentences.cn: 瓣膜性心脏病, 以主动脉瓣及二尖瓣闭锁不全为最常见, 可使各种全身性疾病变得复杂.

words.tran_cn: 并发症；复杂；复杂化；混乱

trans.tran_en: to make a problem or situation more difficult
to make a problem or situation more difficult
